metadata.description: Auditory reflex loops protecting the cochlea and initiating defensive responses to sound.
metadata.notes: Maps qualitative pathways without duplicating biomimetic acoustics modules.

cochlear_startle.afferent: Cochlear nerve fibers to cochlear nucleus and pontine reticular formation.
cochlear_startle.integration: Reticular startle circuitry broadcasting to cranial and spinal motor pools.
cochlear_startle.efferent: Facial, accessory, and spinal motor neurons.
cochlear_startle.effector: Blink, head flexion, and body contraction in response to sound.

stapedius.afferent: Cochlear nucleus projections to superior olivary complex.
stapedius.integration: Brainstem interneurons activating facial motor nucleus.
stapedius.efferent: Facial nerve branch to stapedius muscle.
stapedius.effector: Stiffening of ossicular chain reducing inner ear vibration amplitude.
